testcase.classname: As an administrator (admin), I want a page where I can view multi-class students and perform actions like adding or removing students from multi-class.
testcase.name: On the "Multiclass" page, Class and Section textBoxes, along with a Search button,
testcase.system-out: Given The user goes to the "loginUrl" address...............................passed When The user clicks on the admin login tab.................................passed And The user navigates to a new page that opens in the browser..............passed And The user enters "adminUsername_dgn" into the username textbox...........passed And The user enters "password_dgn" into the password textbox................passed When The user clicks the Sign In button and goes to the admin page..........passed And The user clicks on the Student Information link in the admin panel's sidebar.passed And The user clicks on the Multi Class Student link in the opened dropdown menu.passed Then The user verifies that the Class and Section textboxes are visible on the opened page.undefined And The user clicks on the Class textbox and selects the ""Class 2"" tab from the opened dropdown menu.skipped And The user clicks on the Section textbox and selects the ""A"" tab from the opened dropdown menu.skipped And The user confirms that a colored circle is spinning on the user icon or that a color transition is visible at the top of the page, indicating that the search has been performed..skipped And User closes the page....................................................skipped
